          <title>
            <string language="en">Modelling sedimentary rock formation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Formung der sedimentären Felsenanordnung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modeler la formation de roche sédimentaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modelando a formação de rocha sedimentary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modellistica della formazione rocciosa 
sedimentaria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαμορφώνοντας ιζηματώδης σχηματισμός βράχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modelar la formación de roca sedimentaria</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how the formation of sedimentary rocks can be modelled using sticks, board, and battens.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">battens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">board</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metamorphism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sedimentary rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sticks</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie die Anordnung der 
sedimentären Felsen mit Stöcken, Brett und Battens geformt werden 
kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment la formation des 
roches sédimentaires peut être modelée utilisant les bâtons, le 
panneau, et les lattes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como a formação de rochas 
sedimentary pode ser modelada usando varas, placa, e battens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come la formazione delle 
roccie sedimentarie può essere modellata usando i bastoni, il 
bordo ed i battens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς ο σχηματισμός των 
ιζηματωδών βράχων μπορεί να διαμορφωθεί χρησιμοποιώντας τα 
ραβδιά, τον πίνακα, και battens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo la formación de rocas
sedimentarias se puede modelar usando los palillos, la tarjeta, y los 
listones.</string>
          </description>
